General.Name: Lotus Health Group Co
General.Description: Lotus Health Group Company engages in the production and sale of condiments and foods in China. The company offers monosodium glutamate; chicken essence and other seasonings; and breadcrumbs and other flour products, as well as sauces, starch, and sugars. It also provides cooking wine and other liquid condiments, flour and pasta products, organic and water soluble fertilizers, sesame oil, brown sugar, gift packs, health packs, and baking soda. The company was formerly known as Lotus Health Industry Holding Group Company. Lotus Health Group Company was founded in 1983 and is based in Zhoukou, China.
